00027 PCZSceneNode.h  -  Node Zone Info header file.
00028 The PCZSceneNode is an extension used to store zone information and provide
00029 additional functionality for a given Ogre::SceneNode.  A PCZSceneNode contains
00030 a pointer to the home zone for the node and a list of all zones being visited by
00031 the node.  The PCZSceneManager contains a STD::MAP of PCZSceneNodes which are
00032 keyed by the name of each node (each PCZSceneNode has an identical name to the 
00033 scene node which it is associated with).  This allows quick lookup of
00034 a given scenenode's PCZSceneNode by the scene manager.
00035 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 begin                : Sat Mar 24 2007
00037 author               : Eric Cha
00038 email                : ericc@xenopi.com
00039 Code Style Update    :
00040 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 */
00042 
00043 #ifndef PCZ_SCENE_NODE_H
00044 #define PCZ_SCENE_NODE_H
00045

00047 #include "OgrePCZPrerequisites.h"
00048 
00049 namespace Ogre
00050 {
00051     // forward declarations
00052     class PCZone;
00053     class ZoneData;
00054     class PCZCamera;
00055     typedef map<String, PCZone*>::type ZoneMap;
00056     typedef map<String, ZoneData*>::type ZoneDataMap;
00057 
00058     class _OgrePCZPluginExport PCZSceneNode : public SceneNode
00059     {
00060     public:
00062         PCZSceneNode( SceneManager* creator );

00069

00078             const Quaternion& rotate = Quaternion::IDENTITY );
00079

00090 
00091 
00092         PCZone*     getHomeZone(void);

00096         void        allowToVisit(bool yesno) {mAllowedToVisit = yesno;}
00097         bool        allowedToVisit(void) {return mAllowedToVisit;}
00098         void        addZoneToVisitingZonesMap(PCZone * zone);
00099         void        clearVisitingZonesMap(void);
00100         void        clearNodeFromVisitedZones( void );
00101         void        removeReferencesToZone(PCZone * zone);

00104                                        RenderQueue *queue, 
00105                                        bool onlyShadowCasters, 
00106                                        VisibleObjectsBoundsInfo* visibleBounds );
00107         void        savePrevPosition(void);

00109         unsigned long       getLastVisibleFrame(void) {return mLastVisibleFrame;}
00110         void        setLastVisibleFrame(unsigned long newLVF) {mLastVisibleFrame = newLVF;}
00111         void        setLastVisibleFromCamera(PCZCamera * camera) {mLastVisibleFromCamera = camera;}
00112         PCZCamera*  getLastVisibleFromCamera() {return mLastVisibleFromCamera;}
00113         void        setZoneData(PCZone * zone, ZoneData * zoneData);
00114         ZoneData*   getZoneData(PCZone * zone);
00115         void        updateZoneData(void);
00116         void        enable(bool yesno) {mEnabled = yesno;}
00117         bool        isEnabled(void) {return mEnabled;}
00118         bool        isMoved(void) {return mMoved;}
00119         void        setMoved(bool value) {mMoved = value;}
00120     protected:
